channel.title: 0mFg pest control all most dun need a lil help fishing it
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt]rite i bean thinking about pest control a lot and this is how i would make it and wndering if any body can help[/size][/center] [img]http://p7.piczo.com/img/i88724229_7021_7.gif[/img]
[center][size=10pt]first of the boat so when you click the boats bord at port sarim it teles you on to the boat at pc and you clcik the bord to walk of same with the other one because it better then clciking the front of the boat and ending up in port sarim .. out side the boat so any ways made the shops all reddy fixed the bank thats all dun but about the boat to the island form void knight town or w.e when you clcik the plank you end up in side the boat and a timer will come on the screen and go down from 20 secs onces it hits 0 you tele then you run of not sure about healing nc but use the ration pack thing on other players to heal them by 20 hp or use it your self for 10hp clicking the laders just nock your y or x one spaces forward so thats easy the doors just when you click them they get removed and the portals attck them and they dont move and dont hit you back and the other pc npc i would want say about 40 of em in set x and y but when they spawn they spawn form a random list in item2.java so the same npc not going to spawn in the same places and also so they follow you and hit you as you move and when they first spawn the spot they spawn in playes there gfx tele not sure what the code is for the gfx.. and on the screen have 4 (O) like that and green if the npc is still alive ( the npc of the portal) and red and like this (x) if there dead and if all npc portals are dead true tele all players with in side the x and y of pest controlback to the void knigt out post would that be good because i know getting all the stuf as rs like is hard and not menny poeple have dun it the problem i have atm is the random spawning of the other pc npc i can get them to follow you not sure about beating you up thow got the pc shops boats and all that working the timer in the boat to telel to pc island i still need to work on and the show npc alive and dead on screen (o) (x) thing.. so could any body help me??????????????????????sorry for talking so much LMAO!!!![/size][/center]
[center][size=30pt]o and if any body knows the interfaces code for the boat map added that when you click it would be nices and i made the item.cfg and theres no void knight stuf i can work that out and yet[/size][/center] [center][size=10pt]still no player house made helms and sheilds???? wtf[/size][/center]
thers a big bit missing witch are nulls but there bones and thats the only big spaces in the item.cfg with 7955 items and i tryed working out when it was made after the rag and bone quest after the monk fish and im not sure if pc was out i can be inless the items came out after ..?? because were missing the poh sheilds helms flag things and ovid knight armer im mite see if i can make a command so you can type ::npcbody #### and a void knight npc so you can the top and some with the others ::npcwep #### ::npctop a ####
the fram show on the screen i would make i look like this [img]http://p7.piczo.com/img/i94749768_81998_7.jpg[/img] i did this in paint so i mite have to edit the client to get some of the colors...

item.title: 0mFg pest control all most dun need a lil help fishing it
item.dc:creator: @JxS JxS
item.description:
@JxS wrote:

mod taharok:

You guys have nearly no knowledge whatsoever (with exceptions to fedexer and littlesoul.) Endar is nothing special. It is just a smaller upgrade to the new game engine then you guys think. Belive it or not, it is running on the 377 cache, not the 428. It is actually the only client that is running on the 377, MoparScape and BlakeScape both run on the 317s as well as our servers do. You will need to find all the new frames and interfaces that are included with the 377 before you can think about all new Pest Control and things like that. Remember, it us RS2 Private Server cheaters over a year just to get what we have today on the 317. When someone finishes the 428, we will have to all start from scratch again. This is a good idea, but it will take a lot of work. I am sorry that I can’t help. My sincere apologies.

It has not taken us over a year to get 317 up to standards, maybe server side. If someone was smart enough before xero to go in and decode all the frames we’d be way ahead, and so would Jagex. You can use any cache with any client, with the exception of the new ones. Using a new deob just means you have to change the frames, the packets, and anything else really that requires it. We have no reason to go up to a higher deob, and those who are experimenting with 428 have no server to do anything on. And whats the point of that if we did? Jagex will just make another update, which I think is their plan as soon as we get our roots planted again. And have us start all over for the third time.

Read full topic

@mod_taharok wrote:

You guys have nearly no knowledge whatsoever (with exceptions to fedexer and littlesoul.) Endar is nothing special. It is just a smaller upgrade to the new game engine then you guys think. Belive it or not, it is running on the 377 cache, not the 428. It is actually the only client that is running on the 377, MoparScape and BlakeScape both run on the 317s as well as our servers do. You will need to find all the new frames and interfaces that are included with the 377 before you can think about all new Pest Control and things like that. Remember, it us RS2 Private Server cheaters over a year just to get what we have today on the 317. When someone finishes the 428, we will have to all start from scratch again. This is a good idea, but it will take a lot of work. I am sorry that I can’t help. My sincere apologies.

my cleint is half runescape and half endar[br][size=1]Posted on: December 26, 2006, 03:16:26 PM[/size][hr]so any body going to make pc?? im geting bord -.- cant make all of it by my self now o and i lil chang show the portals like (O) for alive (x) for dead and hp with them as well green ### and red for dead and the (0) (x) bit will be the color of the portal npc… soulscape is all most fixed stupid cpu bernt my grathic card out but i fixed it all most need one m ore new part -.- main in the arse but then im working on the max spawning of random pc npc all over the places that follow you and then so they attck you as well:) [br][size=1]Posted on: December 26, 2006, 10:18:11 PM[/size][hr]hm and also i dont think no body has the exchang interfaces yet so when you click exchang it could open the genie interface window that would be good for now[br][size=1]Posted on: December 26, 2006, 10:21:06 PM[/size][hr]no body going to help me out with pest control!!![br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2006, 07:09:22 PM[/size][hr]?
